body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Perry Auto Solutions. My name is Logan Perry. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Susan. How can I assist you today? I see you are calling about a security concern.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I received a security alert on my account and I'm surprised by it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Susan. To assist you further, could you please provide me with the last four digits of your phone number and your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the last four digits of my phone number are three zero five zero and my zip code is one eight nine zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Susan. Our team will investigate the security alert on your account.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Logan. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Susan. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time today. Goodbye.
